name: Deep Sea Explorer (Interface)
description:
Explore the deep seas for treasure!

Collect as many coins from chests before your oxygen runs out. Find oxygen tanks to extend your stay under water. But beware of hazards in the water! Sharks, dropping anchors and mines should be avoided... there is no regaining health when you're in the deepest deeps!

How many coins can you manage to collect?

Controls: arrow keys (left, right, up, down)
